function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unoccupied buildings may still consume energy, leading to wastage and increased costs","Impact":"Increased energy consumption, higher costs, and environmental impact","Mitigation":"Implementing smart energy management systems, conducting regular energy audits, and optimizing building systems","Technologies":"Smart building automation systems, energy-efficient HVAC systems, occupancy sensors","People":"Building owners, facility managers, energy management professionals","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, energy management professionals"},{"Description":"Higher ventilation rates required for occupants' safety may lead to increased energy use","Impact":"Increased energy consumption and higher costs due to higher ventilation rates","Mitigation":"Implementation of energy-efficient ventilation systems, use of air quality sensors to optimize ventilation, and adoption of energy-efficient building materials","Technologies":"Energy-efficient ventilation systems, air quality sensors, energy-efficient building materials","People":"Architects, building designers, facility managers","Owner":"Building owners, architects, building designers"}]}
